1414590.name: Masters of Puzzle - Black and White - Beads in the Wall
1414590.description:
The puzzle box Beads in the Wall continues the new Black & White series of photos. It is, of course, free for all owners of the game. We really hope you'll like this new type of challenge and enjoy Masters of Puzzle in a slightly different way.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, and 1000 puzzle tiles. The puzzle was created from the original digital photo with applied additional filters and effects. The image is rather unusual and might be difficult to assemble especially in larger tilesets. It will provide a nice challenge for both beginners and veterans alike.
1414590.supported_languages: 英语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
